title: MediCore AI Diagnostic Platform
description: Developed a machine learning solution using TensorFlow and Python that improved diagnostic accuracy by 35% for a leading healthcare provider. Implemented computer vision algorithms for medical imaging analysis.

title: FinanceFlow Cloud Migration
description: Migrated legacy banking systems to AWS cloud infrastructure, reducing operational costs by 40% and improving system reliability. Implemented microservices architecture with Docker and Kubernetes.

title: ShopSmart Mobile Commerce
description: Built a cross-platform mobile app using React Native that increased customer engagement by 60% and boosted sales by 25%. Integrated payment gateways and real-time inventory management.

title: TraceChain Supply Management
description: Implemented a blockchain-based supply chain tracking system using Ethereum and Solidity that improved transparency and reduced fraud by 45%. Features smart contracts for automated compliance.

title: ContentGenius AI Platform
description: Created an AI-powered content generation tool using GPT-4 API that helped marketing teams increase productivity by 70%. Features automated SEO optimization and multi-language support.

title: SmartHome IoT Ecosystem
description: Designed and implemented an IoT system for smart homes using Raspberry Pi and Arduino that reduced energy consumption by 30%. Features voice control and mobile app integration.

title: SalesForce Pro CRM
description: Built a custom cloud-based CRM using Node.js and React that improved sales team efficiency by 55% for a B2B company. Features advanced analytics and automated lead scoring.

title: SecureID Blockchain Verification
description: Created a blockchain-based identity verification system using Hyperledger Fabric that reduced fraud by 80% for a financial institution. Features biometric authentication and zero-knowledge proofs.

title: IndustryWatch IoT Monitor
description: Implemented an IoT solution for industrial equipment monitoring using LoRaWAN and AWS IoT that reduced downtime by 65%. Features predictive maintenance and real-time alerts.

title: StreamAI Recommendation Engine
description: Developed an AI recommendation engine using collaborative filtering and deep learning that increased user engagement by 45% for a streaming platform. Features real-time personalization.

title: FitTracker Health App
description: Created a health tracking mobile app using Flutter and Firebase that helped users improve fitness metrics by an average of 30%. Features wearable device integration and social challenges.

title: DataViz Analytics Dashboard
description: Built a comprehensive analytics dashboard using D3.js and Python that processes 10M+ data points daily. Features real-time visualization and automated reporting for enterprise clients.

title: CloudSecure Infrastructure
description: Designed a multi-cloud security infrastructure using Terraform and Ansible that achieved 99.9% uptime. Implemented zero-trust architecture and automated threat detection.

title: VoiceBot AI Assistant
description: Developed a voice-activated AI assistant using natural language processing that handles 95% of customer inquiries automatically. Features multi-language support and sentiment analysis.
